text:
@NYGovCuomo Wake up Andrew Cuomo !    
Your MTA workers have been dying from diesel fumes inhalation 2-3 years after retirement, for generations in bus depots.130 + MTA employees who died from COVID-19 shouldn’t be a surprise. Their heath was already compromised ! https://t.co/oAXMdwPO5J
